reviewText:
Because i was searching this movie from long time ago and i finally Find it.
Excellent and i'm very happy
all time classic surfing sci-fi . the sound track  is great. surfing is very mellow, would love to surf some of these locations.

Yes, my opinion is bias since I'm related to Casanova, but it is still a really funny movie.  The surfing is cool too, especially the locations.
I think my favorite part is the weed-wacker sound used when the van is in motion!!
Very important to watch the movie, then listen to the entire commentary. The commentary is truly the best part. Freight train barrel is amazing.

Perfect for a night with friends....drinking beer, and mining the stoke! Nice longboarding waves, with a dash of shortboard...the other reviewer was right; This movie is more about the awesome plot, and super cheap special effects. Blast it!!

I forget where exactly I heard about this movie, but I bought it a while back from their website. It is one of the funniest, weirdest, and most enjoyable surf movies I have seen. The surfing itself is nothing too exciting aside from some slow rolling longboard waves (with maybe like three shortboard waves thrown in there), but the plot and acting is awesome. If you buy this and you surf or have an odd sense of humor, you will not be disappointed.
